borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2023/02933/FUL dated 31st January 2024 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height to match no. 13 Beauclerc Road, including new dormer windows; the enlargement of rear side parapet wall between no. 15 and 17 Beauclerc Road, and relocation of existing satellite dish to the new enlarged parapet wall; a new dormer window between the rear roof extension and second floor level following the removal of an existing window, the erection of front parapet wall to match sides on top of existing second floor back addition, the erection of 1.6m high obscure glazed screening on top of the existing second floor back addition, in connection with its use as a roof terrace; alterations to the existing single storey rear extension to include, erection of a new parapet upstand following the removal of existing sloped rooflights, and installation of new metal framed doors with window panels following the removal of existing timber bi-folding doors to the rear elevation; installation of 3no. rooflights in the front roofslope, and replacement of existing clay roof tiles with slate; alterations to the external front facade to include, re-pointing brick wall and rendering; and replacement of existing windows with new double glazed windows to match existing.' Amendments sought for the omission of 2no. approved rooflights located within flat roof of ground floor rear extension in favour of 1no. sloping rooflight within flat roof of ground floor rear extension, and erection of a timber slatted bin store with felt roof in the front garden.
